_header: Yet of Saint George is my will
Subjects: George, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. George, in the Scottish Legendary — in couplets

CULGg26.First Lines:
[Ȝ]ete of sancte george is my wilgyf I connandnes had
                    þare til…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…he til god wil for ws prayto hewynnis blis þat we cum
                    ma
CULGg26.Note:
Followed by false start to 6860, ‘a bettore tel wil I a tak
                    here’
CULGg26.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Barbours des schottischen Nationaldichters Legendensammlung.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 2.61-73.
Metcalfe,  William Musham,
                        ed.  
             Legends of the Saints, in the Scottish dialect of the fourteenth
                century….
             6 pts. in 3 vols. 
             Scottish Text Society
         13, 18, 23, 25, 35, 37. Edinburgh, London: Blackwood, 1896: 2.2.176-203.
